title: UDO - 1988 - Animal House [320kbs] ~~Renovatio~~
description:
Animal House is the 1987 debut album from U.D.O. after Udo Dirkschneider's departure from Accept. It was recorded August-October 1987 at Dierks Studios, Cologne. It charted #41 in Sweden.

The performance of the song "Lay Down the Law" is credited to Accept and U.D.O..
Pulheimer Kinder- und Jugendchor contribute vocals to "They Want War".
